title: The Playful Dolphin
description: Dolphins are highly intelligent marine mammals known for their playful behavior and social nature. They communicate using a variety of clicks, whistles, and other sounds.

questions.question: What is a dolphin's primary method of communication and navigation?
How do dolphins sleep?
options: They close their eyes and sink to the bottom
They lie on their side and breathe slowly
They rest one half of their brain at a time
questions.correct_answer: They rest one half of their brain at a time

questions.question: What is the collective noun for a group of dolphins?
What is the largest species of dolphin?
How do dolphins breathe?
options: Through a blowhole on top of their head
questions.correct_answer: Through a blowhole on top of their head
